data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zi-Wei Yin, Ri-Xin Jiang (2017): Apharinodes sinensis sp. n. (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from China, and discovery of male wing dimorphism in Hybocephalini. Revue suisse de Zoologie 124 (1): 9-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.322660|2 occurrences
